00007 namespace Eigen {

00009 template <typename _Scalar, int _Rows, int _Cols> class PythonMatrix;
00010 
00011 template <typename _Scalar, int _Rows, int _Cols> 
00012 struct ei_traits< PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> > {
00013     typedef _Scalar Scalar;
00014     enum {
00015         RowsAtCompileTime = _Rows,
00016         ColsAtCompileTime = _Cols,
00017         MaxRowsAtCompileTime = _Rows,
00018         MaxColsAtCompileTime = _Cols,
00019         Flags = 0,
00020         CoeffReadCost = NumTraits<Scalar>::ReadCost
00021     };
00022 };
00023 
00024 template <typename _Scalar, int _Rows, int _Cols>
00025 class PythonMatrix : public MatrixBase< PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> > {
00026 public:
00027     
00028     EIGEN_GENERIC_PUBLIC_INTERFACE(PythonMatrix);
00029 
00030     explicit PythonMatrix(boost::numpy::matrix const & py) : _py(py) {
00031         if ((_Rows != Eigen::Dynamic && _Rows != _py.shape(0))
00032             || (_Cols != Eigen::Dynamic && _Cols != _py.shape(1))) {
00033             if ((_Rows == 1 && _py.shape(1) == 1 && (_Cols == Eigen::Dynamic || _Cols == _py.shape(0))) 
00034                 || (_Cols == 1 && _py.shape(0) == 1 && (_Rows == Eigen::Dynamic || _Rows == _py.shape(1)))) {
00035                 _py = py.transpose();
00036             } else {
00037                 PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError, "Incorrect shape for fixed-size matrix.");
00038                 boost::python::throw_error_already_set();
00039             }
00040         }
00041         if (_py.get_dtype() != boost::numpy::dtype::get_builtin<_Scalar>()) {
00042             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "Incorrect data type for matrix.");
00043             boost::python::throw_error_already_set();
00044         }
00045     }
00046 
00047     EIGEN_INHERIT_ASSIGNMENT_OPERATORS(PythonMatrix);
00048 
00049     Scalar * data() { return _py.get_data(); }
00050     Scalar const * data() const { return _py.get_data(); }
00051 
00052     inline int rows() const { return _py.shape(0); }
00053     inline int cols() const { return _py.shape(1); }
00054 
00055     inline Scalar & coeffRef(int row, int col) {
00056         return *reinterpret_cast<Scalar*>(_py.get_data() + row * _py.strides(0) + col * _py.strides(1));
00057     }
00058 
00059     inline Scalar const coeff(int row, int col) const {
00060         return *reinterpret_cast<Scalar*>(_py.get_data() + row * _py.strides(0) + col * _py.strides(1));
00061     }
00062 
00063     inline Scalar & coeffRef(int index) {
00064         if (_Rows == 1)
00065             return *reinterpret_cast<Scalar*>(_py.get_data() + index * _py.strides(1));
00066         else if (_Cols == 1)
00067             return *reinterpret_cast<Scalar*>(_py.get_data() + index * _py.strides(0));
00068         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "Cannot index PythonMatrix with a single integer.");
00069         boost::python::throw_error_already_set();
00070     }
00071 
00072     inline Scalar const coeff(int index) const {
00073         if (_Rows == 1)
00074             return *reinterpret_cast<Scalar*>(_py.get_data() + index * _py.strides(1));
00075         else if (_Cols == 1)
00076             return *reinterpret_cast<Scalar*>(_py.get_data() + index * _py.strides(0));
00077         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "Cannot index PythonMatrix with a single integer.");
00078         boost::python::throw_error_already_set();
00079     }
00080 
00081     boost::numpy::matrix getPyObject() const { return _py; }
00082 
00083 private:
00084     boost::numpy::matrix _py;
00085 };
00086 
00087 } // namespace Eigen

00089 namespace boost { namespace python {

00091 template <typename _Scalar, int _Rows, int _Cols>
00092 struct to_python_value< Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> const & > 
00093     : public detail::builtin_to_python
00094 {
00095     inline PyObject * operator()(Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> const & x) const {
00096         numpy::matrix obj(x.getPyObject());
00097         Py_INCREF(obj.ptr());
00098         return obj.ptr();
00099     }
00100     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {
00101         return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::matrix>::get_pytype();
00102     }
00103 };
00104 
00105 template <typename _Scalar, int _Rows, int _Cols>
00106 struct to_python_value< Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> & > 
00107     : public detail::builtin_to_python
00108 {
00109     inline PyObject * operator()(Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> & x) const {
00110         numpy::matrix obj(x.getPyObject());
00111         Py_INCREF(obj.ptr());
00112         return obj.ptr();
00113     }
00114     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {
00115         return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::matrix>::get_pytype();
00116     }

00121 template <typename _Scalar, int _Rows, int _Cols>
00122 struct arg_to_python< Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> > : public handle<> {
00123     inline arg_to_python(Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> const & v) :
00124         handle<>(borrowed(v.getPyObject().ptr())) {}
00125 };
00126 
00127 template <typename _Scalar, int _Rows, int _Cols>
00128 struct arg_rvalue_from_python< Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> const & > {
00129     typedef Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols> result_type;
00130 
00131     arg_rvalue_from_python(PyObject * p) : _p(borrowed(p)) {}
00132 
00133     bool convertible() const { return true; }
00134 
00135     result_type operator()() const {
00136         boost::numpy::matrix m(python::detail::borrowed_reference(_p.get()));
00137         return Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar,_Rows,_Cols>(m);
00138     }
00139 
00140 private:
00141     mutable handle<> _p;
00142 };
